wsoauth-desc: Extends the PluggableAuth extension to provide authentication using OAuth.
wsoauth-pluggable-auth-class-desc: The class name that extends PluggableAuth; this configuration parameter is set by the extension and should not be edited by the user.
wsoauth-client-id-desc: The consumer key received from the OAuth application.
wsoauth-client-secret-desc: The consumer secret received from the OAuth application.
wsoauth-redirect-uri-desc: The default callback URL to which the OAuth application returns after a successful authentication request.
wsoauth-auth-providers-desc: An array containing a list of custom OAuth providers together with their class name.
wsoauth-auth-provider-desc: The OAuth provider that the extension will use.
wsoauth-auto-populate-groups-desc: An array containing a list of MediaWiki group names that must be automatically assigned to the user after they are authenticated.
wsoauth-pluggable-auth-button-label-mess: The name of the message that will be used for the label of the login button on the Special:UserLogin form.
wsoauth-authentication-failure: Authentication failed (are you authorised for this wiki?).
wsoauth-invalid-username: Username provided by the OAuth provider is not valid.
wsoauth-unknown-auth-provider-class-exce: OAuth provider class not loaded or not found
wsoauth-invalid-auth-provider-class-exce: The OAuth provider class does not implement AuthProvider
wsoauth-initiate-login-failure: Unable to initiate communication with OAuth provider.
